io.micronaut.http.server.codec

Class JsonStreamCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.http.server.codec.JsonStreamCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MediaTypeCodec

    public class JsonStreamCodec
extends Object
implements MediaTypeCodec
    Allow encoding objects using MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON_STREAM.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
